USA: The English settlement of Savannah and the Province of Georgia were founded by James Oglethorpe.
Taiwan: Quarantine policies are abandoned by the Qing government and the military organization in Taiwan is overhauled; families on the mainland are allowed to move to Taiwan
Poland: War of the Polish Succession begins
Death of August II the Strong
Election of August III the Saxon
Barbados: Harrison College (formerly Harrison's Free School), is established by Bridgetown-merchant Thomas Harrison.
